citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm-1:00pm on
21-NOV-22. The inspector knocked on the door, honked the horn, and waited 30 minutes before departing the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm-1:00pm on 
21-NOV-22.  The inspector knocked on the door, honked the horn, and waited 30 minutes before departing the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
